metadata.name: Comprehensive
metadata.raw_xml:
<Coverage name="Comprehensive" id="C-101" category="PhysicalDamage">
      <Governance_Rules>
        <Effective_Date value="2026-01-01"/>
        <Governance_Level value="Global_Master"/>
        <Factor_Precedence value="Sequential"/>
        <Global_Discount_Cap value="0.25"/>
      </Governance_Rules>

      <RatingAlgorithm type="Recursive_Matrix">
        <BaseRate value="0.015"/>
        <RiskFactors>
          <Factor name="Environmental_Surcharge" multiplier="1.05" trigger="StandardEnv"/>
          
          <Factor name="SafeDriver" multiplier="0.85" trigger="ClaimsHistory=0"/>
          <Factor name="HighMileage" multiplier="1.20" trigger="AnnualMileage > 15000"/>
          <Factor name="MultiPolicy" multiplier="0.90" trigger="LinkCount > 1"/>
          <Factor name="MultiCar" multiplier="0.85" trigger="VehicleCount > 1"/>
        </RiskFactors>
      </RatingAlgorithm>
      
      <Deductibles default="500">
        <Option value="250" surcharge="50"/>
        <Option value="500" surcharge="0"/>
      </Deductibles>
    </Coverage>

REGION: Global_Base | TAG: Governance_Rules | ID: Governance_Rules | CONTENT: <Governance_Rules>
        <Effective_Date value="2026-01-01"/>
        <Governance_Level value="Global_Master"/>
        <Factor_Precedence value="Sequential"/>
        <Global_Discount_Cap value="0.25"/>
      </Governance_Rules>
REGION: Global_Base | TAG: Factor | ID: Environmental_Surcharge | CONTENT: <Factor name="Environmental_Surcharge" multiplier="1.05" trigger="StandardEnv"/>
REGION: Global_Base | TAG: Factor | ID: SafeDriver | CONTENT: <Factor name="SafeDriver" multiplier="0.85" trigger="ClaimsHistory=0"/>
REGION: Global_Base | TAG: Factor | ID: HighMileage | CONTENT: <Factor name="HighMileage" multiplier="1.20" trigger="AnnualMileage > 15000"/>
REGION: Global_Base | TAG: Factor | ID: MultiPolicy | CONTENT: <Factor name="MultiPolicy" multiplier="0.90" trigger="LinkCount > 1"/>
REGION: Global_Base | TAG: Factor | ID: MultiCar | CONTENT: <Factor name="MultiCar" multiplier="0.85" trigger="VehicleCount > 1"/>

REGION: Global_Base | TAG: Coverage | ID: Uninsured_Motorist | CONTENT: <Coverage name="Uninsured_Motorist" id="UM-202" category="Liability">
      <Limits default="25000/50000"/>
      <Premium type="FlatFee" value="45.00"/>
    </Coverage>

text:
REGION: CA | TAG: Governance_Rules | ID: Governance_Rules | CONTENT: <Governance_Rules>
    <Effective_Date value="2026-01-01"/>
    <Governance_Level value="Regional_Overlay"/>
    <Factor_Precedence value="Sequential"/>
  </Governance_Rules>

REGION: CA | TAG: Coverage | ID: Comprehensive | CONTENT: <Coverage name="Comprehensive" inheritsFrom="Comprehensive">
      <RatingAlgorithm>
        <Override action="Append">
          <Factor name="CA_Seismic_Surcharge" multiplier="1.08"/>
        </Override>
      </RatingAlgorithm>
    </Coverage>
REGION: CA | TAG: Factor | ID: CA_Seismic_Surcharge | CONTENT: <Factor name="CA_Seismic_Surcharge" multiplier="1.08"/>

REGION: CA | TAG: Coverage | ID: CA_LIA_Program | CONTENT: <Coverage name="CA_LIA_Program" id="CA-LIA-400">
      <Eligibility>IncomeTier IN ('A', 'B')</Eligibility>
      <FlatFee value="20.00"/>
      <Forms>
        <Form name="LIA_Eligibility_Affidavit" id="CA-FRM-LIA" requirement="Mandatory"/>
      </Forms>
    </Coverage>
